title: No boundary or compound wall or fence shall be erected on the boundary not to any street of a greater height than 4 feet measured from the center of the road in front
clause_text: No boundary or compound wall or fence shall be erected on the boundary not to any street of a greater height than 4 feet measured from the center of the road in front.
section: Special Building Rules framed by the Collector of Pune for this area shall be applicable which are as given below -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: No boundary or compound wall or fence shall be erected on the boundary not to any street of a greater height than 4 feet measured from the center of the road in front.
